content.html: @bascht I do not speak German but my browser (Vivaldi - also the company I work for) will auto-translate selected text in a side panel. I use this frequently and while it has the same failing as all automatic translations it is workable for many situations if a little caution and thought is used. Thus I am not too concerned with following people who use other languages.
